description: Pattern detection notifications fail to display when patterns found. User misses important trading opportunities.
commonCauses: Notification channel not created or disabled
Do Not Disturb mode blocking notifications
App in battery optimization preventing background work
Notification posted from background thread incorrectly
solutions: Create notification channel with HIGH importance
Check notification channel status before posting
Use unique notification IDs for each pattern
Post notification on main thread or use NotificationManagerCompat
Verify app not in battery optimization
prevention: Always request notification permission on Android 13+
Create notification channels at app startup
Test notifications with Do Not Disturb enabled
Monitor notification display rate in analytics
